document.full_text: to fans, he was movie star tough guy the terminator. then he turned to politics and was affectionately dubbed the governator. but after acknowledging that he fathered a child out of wedlock, arnold schwarzenegger was swiftly given a new name -- the sperminator.
document.title: "sperminator" schwarzenegger scorned over love child
lines_and_colors: to fans, he was movie star tough guy the terminator. then he turned to politics and was affectionately dubbed the governator. but after acknowledging that he fathered a child out of wedlock, arnold schwarzenegger was swiftly given a new name -- the sperminator.
